name: Pastry Pop Demo V1
description:
Pastry Pop demo is a minigame for one of my more major games. It is about a character named Pammie who gets sent to a dimension of food to rescue her friends.

The game is very early, so there are only 3 levels and the game also plays like an old arcade game.

Use left and right to move, space to jump, Z to shoot, and use the up and down keys to direct the fireball you shoot.

the way to finish the game is to collect all the pastries in each level while avoiding dying. Enemies drop extra pastries to collect, so you can improve your score.

Also,  use T to restart the game, Y to close the game, and L to skip a level. These are debug features I'm leaving in for now.

Try to get the highest score, although it is kind of luck dependent since some pastries will randomly have higher points to give.
